SEARCH
Package aor.fpbackend.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.service.UserService
@Path("/users") public class UserService extends Object
UserService is a JAX-RS resource class that provides RESTful endpoints for user management, including registration, authentication, profile updates, and role management.

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      @POST @Path("/register") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public void registerUser(@Valid @Valid UserRegisterDto user) throws InvalidCredentialsException, EntityNotFoundException
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user registration data.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the provided credentials are invalid.
      EntityNotFoundException - if required entities are not found.

    • confirmRegistration

      @PUT @Path("/confirm") @Consumes("application/json") public void confirmRegistration(@QueryParam("token") String token) throws InputValidationException, UserNotFoundException
      Confirms user registration.
      Parameters:
      token - the confirmation token.
      Throws:
      InputValidationException - if the input validation fails.
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • requestConfirmationEmail

      @POST @Path("/request/confirmation/email") @Consumes("application/json") public void requestConfirmationEmail(EmailDto email) throws InvalidRequestOnRegistConfirmationException
      Requests a new confirmation email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email data transfer object.
      Throws:
      InvalidRequestOnRegistConfirmationException - if the request is invalid.

    • requestPasswordReset

      @PUT @Path("/request/password/reset") @Consumes("application/json") public void requestPasswordReset(@Valid @Valid PasswordRequestResetDto passwordRequestResetDto) throws UserNotFoundException, ForbiddenAccessException
      Requests a password reset.
      Parameters:
      passwordRequestResetDto - the password reset request data transfer object.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      ForbiddenAccessException - if the request is forbidden.

    • resetPassword

      @PUT @Path("/password/reset") @Consumes("application/json") public void resetPassword(@Valid @Valid PasswordResetDto passwordResetDto) throws UserNotFoundException, ForbiddenAccessException
      Resets the user's password.
      Parameters:
      passwordResetDto - the password reset data transfer object.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      ForbiddenAccessException - if the request is forbidden.

    • login

      @POST @Path("/login") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response login(@Valid @Valid UserLoginDto userLogin) throws InvalidCredentialsException
      Authenticates a user.
      Parameters:
      userLogin - the user login data transfer object.
      Returns:
      a response indicating the outcome of the login attempt.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the provided credentials are invalid.

    • logout

      @POST @Path("/logout") @Consumes("application/json") public void logout(@Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws UserNotFoundException
      Logs out the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

      securityContext - the security context.
      Returns:
      the basic user information.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • userInfo

      @GET @Path("info/{usernameProfile}") @Produces("application/json") public UserProfileDto userInfo(@PathParam("usernameProfile") String usernameProfile, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws UserNotFoundException, ForbiddenAccessException
      Retrieves profile information for a user by username.
      Parameters:
      usernameProfile - the username.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Returns:
      the user profile information.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      ForbiddenAccessException - if access is forbidden.

    • editUserData

      @PUT @Path("/profile") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public void editUserData(@Valid @Valid UserUpdateDto updatedUser, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws UserNotFoundException, EntityNotFoundException, DatabaseOperationException
      Allows an authenticated user to update their own profile data.
      Parameters:
      updatedUser - the updated user data.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      EntityNotFoundException - if the entity is not found.
      DatabaseOperationException - if a database error occurs.

    • updateUserPassword

      @PUT @Path("/password") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public void updateUserPassword(@Valid @Valid PasswordUpdateDto updatedPassword, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws UserNotFoundException, InputValidationException
      Updates the password of an authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      updatedPassword - the updated password data.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      InputValidationException - if the input validation fails.

    • updateUserRole

      @PUT @Path("/role") @Consumes("application/json") public void updateUserRole(@Valid @Valid UserUpdateRoleDto updatedRole) throws InvalidCredentialsException, UnknownHostException, EntityNotFoundException
      Updates the role of a user.
      Parameters:
      updatedRole - the updated role data.
      Throws:
      InvalidCredentialsException - if the credentials are invalid.
      UnknownHostException - if the host is unknown.
      EntityNotFoundException - if the entity is not found.

      Retrieves users by project ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the project ID.
      Returns:
      a list of project membership data transfer objects.
